title: Ukraine says they blocked barrage of 18 Russian missiles over Kyiv
description: The Ukrainian Air Force is claiming victories over the skies in Kyiv, saying they blocked a massive barrage of 18 Russian missiles. NBC News’ Molly Hunter has more details on the attack as Ukraine’s President Zelenskyy returned from a successful European tour.

title: ‘We are Europeans, so we are free’: Zelenskyy asks E.U. to stand firm against Russia
description: After thanking member states for military aid and requesting more, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy told the Council of Europe meeting in Iceland, “We are Europeans, so we act at 100% of our strength when it comes to protecting our way of life. Let this be forever the rule of our continent.”

title: France issues arrest warrant for Lebanese central bank governor
description: BEIRUT— A French investigative judge Tuesday issued an international arrest warrant for Lebanon’s embattled central bank governor after he didn’t show up for questioning in France on corruption charges, a Western diplomat said.

title: State Department condemns Russia's arrest of former U.S. consulate worker
description: A former U.S. consulate employee and Russian national was arrested by Russian security forces and charged with espionage, drawing condemnation from the State Department.

title: Beijing LGBT Center shuttered as crackdown grows in China
description: An advocacy group that also served as a safe space for the LGBTQ community in Beijing became the latest organization to close under a crackdown by Chinese leader Xi Jinping’s government.

title: Ecuador's showdown between president, lawmakers could result in either's ouster
description: A showdown between Ecuador’s President Guillermo Lasso and the opposition-led National Assembly could result in either side being booted from office this week.

title: Nigerian chef attempts world record by cooking for 100 hours
description: Nigerian chef Hilda Baci attempted to break the world record for nonstop cooking by dishing up dozens of Nigerian delicacies for more than 100 hours. Despite not being present for Baci’s feat, the Guinness World Records said they would review the evidence before confirming the record.

title: CIA urges Russians to share state secrets with U.S. spies in a dramatic new video
description: The CIA has posted a video on social media offering Russians a secure way to communicate with the agency, asking for info about the Ukraine war and other secrets.

title: CIA offers Russians secure way to share intelligence with U.S. spies
description: The CIA has released a video on the popular Russian messaging app Telegram urging Russians to share intelligence with the U.S. The video offers Russians a secure way to communicate with the agency, promising to protect their safety if they have secrets about the war in Ukraine.

title: German court sentences 5 to prison for $100 million jewelry heist
description: A German court on Tuesday convicted five men over the theft of 18th-century jewels worth more than $100 million from a Dresden museum in 2019.

title: Nigerian chef cooks nonstop for 100 hours to set new world record
description: A Nigerian chef set a new global record for the longest hours nonstop cooking as she cooked for 100 hours, surpassing the current record on Monday.

title: Russia denounces Macron for saying Moscow is becoming a Chinese 'vassal'
description: Russian officials on Monday denounced comments by French President Emmanuel Macron that Moscow was becoming subservient to China, saying Western countries must get used to a world underpinned by the Kremlin’s close ties with Beijing.

title: Ukrainian forces gain ground in Bakhmut
description: Ukrainian troops on the front line in Bakhmut have been advancing as the fierce fighting to push Russian forces from the country continues. Soldiers in Ukraine’s 3rd Brigade showed Russian positions they had captured in recent days, which contained foxholes and equipment left by fleeing soldiers.

title: Russia launches ‘exceptional’ air attack on Kyiv with drones and missiles
description: Ukrainian air defenses thwarted an intense Russian air attack on Kyiv early Tuesday, shooting down all 18 missiles aimed at the capital.

title: At least 6 people killed, 11 injured in New Zealand hostel fire
description: An investigation is underway after a deadly fire broke out at the Loafers Lounge hostel in Wellington, New Zealand.

title: Fire at New Zealand hostel kills at least 6 people, prime minister says
description: A fire ripped through a hostel in Wellington, New Zealand, overnight, killing at least six people
